name: Teleportal Trial
description:
Bend space and time to your will as you complete teleportation-based trials, and earn your freedom, with the added power of permanent teleportation abilities!

Teleportal Error is a short strategy game created for the LOWREZJAM 2021, where you use the power of instant teleportation to your advantage to make it out of deadly situations, and make it through 2 ancient trials.

The optional themes used were: 'Instant Teleportation', 'Secret', 'Gone Wrong'

-----------------------

Movement: W-A-S-D or ARROW KEYS

-----------------------

Right-Mouse-Button (Or 'T'): Teleport
Left-Mouse-Button (Or 'E'): Step-Back (When unlocked)

-----------------------

F: - Toggle FPS

SplendidDog - Chase (@SplendidJams) / Twitter

RAW Sounds Creation (@sounds_creation) / Twitter
